name: Thanks for the Buggy Ride
summary_text: Jenny, a dance instructor, accidentally meets Joe Hall, a song promoter who escorts her home. She gives him a song idea by saying "Thanks for the Buggy Ride".

name: Texas Tommy
summary_text: Bob Cooper (Bob Custer), an undercover lawman, is mistaken for a bandit gang-leader called Texas Tommy (J.P. McGowan). It leads him to becoming the foreman of a ranch owned by an invalid. ...                See full summary »

name: A Woman in the Night
summary_text: A Russian ballerina weds a shellshock victim and has a child by his friend.

name: Take Me Home
summary_text: Take Me Home is a 1928 silent comedy produced by Famous Players-Lasky and distributed by Paramount Pictures. The film was directed by Marshall Neilan and starred Bebe Daniels and Neil Hamilton. The film is now considered a lost film.

name: Stool Pigeon
summary_text: An underworld story about a boy (Charles Delaney) suspected of being a stool pigeon but in reality he is only stealing to give his mother a better life. His devoted girlfriend Goldie (Olive Borden) tries to help him turn his life around.

name: Stolen Love
summary_text: About a girl whose past casts a shadow over her future happiness with the man who loves her. How much of her past must a girl tell the man she wants to marry?

name: Stocks and Blondes
summary_text: A young stockbroker is in love with a nightclub entertainer he loses his job and the girl at work one night obtains some information about money making stocks And passes it on to her ...                See full summary »

name: The Sporting Age
summary_text: Blinded in a train accident James Driscoll (Holmes Herbert), whose wife, Miriam Driscoll (Belle Bennett), has been having an affair with his young male secretary Phillip Kingston )Carroll ...                See full summary »

name: Spangles
summary_text: A circus wirewalker prefers a humble clown to an Earl's son.

name: Son of the Golden West
summary_text: The film takes place around 1860 in the Rocky Mountain region. Tom Hardy (Tom Mix), a pony express rider, is carrying government gold in a coach to Wassatch accompanied by Alice Calhoun (...                See full summary »

name: Someone to Love
summary_text: Jilted by his sweetheart, Joan Kendricks, William Shelby decides that the only way to get over an old romance is to start several new ones. His two pals immediately try to show him that all...                See full summary »

name: Soft Living
summary_text: Nancy Woods, secretary to a divorce lawyer, is tantalized by the idea of collecting alimony payments, she marries Stockney Webb with the intention of fleecing him after the honeymoon. ...                See full summary »

name: The Siren
summary_text: A high-society woman, Glenna Marsh (Dorothy Revier), is arrested for the murder of gigolo-gambler Cole Norwood (Norman Trevor), but his honest casino partner Peter Dane (Tom Moore) proves her innocence.

name: Sinners in Love
summary_text: Ann Hardy (Olive Borden) heads to the big city where she falls in love with Huntley Gordon but she is heartbroken to learn he is just using her.

name: Silent Sentinel
summary_text: THe president of a trust company frames his cashiers for his theft of funds so that he can also collect from the bonding companies. Bob Benton (Gareth Hughes), an assistant cashier, aids ...                See full summary »

name: The Whip
summary_text: Lord Brancaster, a decent and upright British nobleman, loses his memory in an accident. While in this amnesiac condition, he becomes involved with the training of a horse, the Whip, for ...                See full summary »

name: Shadows of the Night
summary_text: Gray plays a reporter trying to unravel a murder involving organized crime. Lorraine plays the heroine.

name: The Secret Hour
summary_text: The Secret Hour is a lost 1928 silent film romance drama directed by Rowland V. Lee and starring Pola Negri. It is based on the 1924 Broadway play, They Knew What They Wanted by Sidney ...                See full summary »

name: The Prince of Rogues
summary_text: During the Napoleonic era, a German renegade fights against the French invaders and those locals who are friendly to them.

name: Saxophon-Susi
summary_text: Silent version of a story later remade in French and German as Baby: A count's daughter wants a stage career, her show girl friend wants an education, so they change places.

name: The Sawdust Paradise
summary_text: The story of a show girl in a crooked carnival attraction who becomes the enthusiastic aide of an elderly evangelist.

name: Satan and the Woman
summary_text: Leone Daingerfield, a ruthless old woman, tries to crush the romance between her heir, Edward Daingerfield, and her granddaughter, Judith, whose blood relationship she refuses to acknowledge.

name: Sailors Don't Care
summary_text: A knight poses as a rating aboard his son's cruiser and helps the Q-ship sink a U-boat.

name: Saddle Mates
summary_text: John Benson and Tim Mannick ride into Marin City in search of Morgan Shelby, a crook who cheated them out of their ranch. Shelby tries to kill them, hiring gunman Bob Grice to do the job, ...                See full summary »

name: Whirl of Youth
summary_text: Heli's misfortune begins when her mother, the landlady, marries for the second time. The man is bossy and brutal. In an argument between stepfather and brother, Heli intervenes: She throws a hatchet, the stepfather falls and is killed.

name: Rossiya Nikolaya II i Lev Tolstoy
summary_text: Documentary about Russian classic author Leo Tolstoy assembled from archive newsreel footage by Esfir Shub.

name: The River Pirate
summary_text: Whart-rat Nick Stuart grows up in reform school and is taken under the wing of likable career-criminal Victor McLagien, who makes him part of his illicit operations.

name: Rinty of the Desert
summary_text: Rinty (Rin-Tin-Tin), a dog of the desert, wanders into a big city and finds many reasons to turn his back on humanity. He is given a home by sweet June Marlow (Audrey Ferris) but he soon ...                See full summary »

name: The Ringer
summary_text: Police fail to prevent a disguised crook from killing his partner.

name: Riding for Fame
summary_text: A champion bronc buster is hired to break horses, but winds up accused of stealing money from his boss. He has to clear his name and find the real thieves.

name: Riders of the Dark
summary_text: Lieutenant Crane (Tim McCoy)of the U. S. Cavalry is assigned to clean up and bring law and order to a frontier town and area ruled by a gang of cattle rustlers. His only help is Molly ...                See full summary »

name: Restless Youth
summary_text: Innocent co-ed Dixie is unjustly expelled for unladylike activities by college chairman John Neil, (who also happens to be the local District Attorney). Dixie uses an employment agency to ...                See full summary »

name: A Reckless Gamble
summary_text: An heir wins a fortune when a friend mistakenly backs his rival.

name: A Race for Life
summary_text: Danny O'Shea (Bobby Gordon) runs away from hone with his pet dog Rinty (Rin-Tin-Tin) and heads for a race track determined to become a famous jockey. Aided by Rinty he is soon riding in a big race.

name: Queen of the Chorus
summary_text: A chorus girl falls for a young man pretending to be his boss, a millionaire. WHen his boss returns from a European trip and finds that the woman he loves is engaged to his secretary, complications ensue.

name: Put 'Em Up
summary_text: Tom Evans and his cronies see the local stage intercepted by Lannister's men, one of whom, Mullins, tries to force his attentions on a passenger, Helen Turner, who is returning from school.

name: The Price of Divorce
summary_text: A doctor working in an English country town lives with his wife, his eight year old son and his female cousin who works as his secretary. His blonde wife has a lover and she wants a divorce...                See full synopsis »

name: Prep and Pep
summary_text: A bashful, timid 17-year-old boy comes to school and finds that the whole student boy and faculty expect him to live up to his father's accomplishments at the same school. The father is ...                See full summary »

name: Powder My Back
summary_text: Powder My Back is a lost 1928 silent film comedy directed by Roy Del Ruth and starring Irene Rich. It was produced and distributed by Warner Bros. who released it with a Vitaphone music and sound effects track.

name: The Play Girl
summary_text: When Madge ( Madge Bellamy ), a flower shop clerk, is sent to a bachelor's apartment to deliver and arrange a bouquet, she discovers a guest, young and handsome Bradley Lane ( John Mack ...                See full summary »

name: The Physician
summary_text: A temperance lecturer's fiancée learns he has a child by his ex-mistress, and that he is an incurable dipsomaniac.

name: The Patriot
summary_text: Paul I, the Emperor of All Russia, becomes the target of a deadly conspiracy.

name: Paradise
summary_text: On the Riviera, a doctor steals a milliner's winnings to save her from a gigolo.

name: Outcast Souls
summary_text: Alice Davis and Charles Turner are arrested for petting in an automobile and marry on impulse. When Alice's mother comes to live with them, she quickly sees that she is not wanted, and she ...                See full summary »

name: Outcast
summary_text: Outcast is a 1928 silent film drama produced and distributed by First National Pictures. It was directed by William A. Seiter and stars Corinne Griffith, often considered one of the most ...                See full summary »

name: The Old Code
summary_text: An Indian girl is in love with French trapper Pierre, but he is interested in a French orphan, Marie. Complications ensue.

name: Object: Alimony
summary_text: Ruth Butler, a clerk in an emporium, marries Jimmy Rutledge and thereby greatly displeases his mother, the owner of the emporium, because of Ruth's lowly origins. Renaud Graham, one of Mrs....                See full summary »

name: None But the Brave
summary_text: College hero Charles Stanton fails miserably as an insurance agent; so he becomes a lifeguard, saves an injured swimmer and is rewarded for his valor.

name: A Night of Mystery
summary_text: Bound for Africa the next day, Captain Ferréol visits Gilberte Boismartel, his former sweetheart who is now married to Rochemore, a French magistrate, to return her love letters. Leaving he witness the murder of Rochemore.

name: Night Watch
summary_text: When the commander of a cruiser sunk in a confrontation is tried for negligence, will the wife speak in his defense? She was trapped in a lower cabin belonging to a subordinate officer,her former lover.

name: Nameless Men
summary_text: Bob Strong, a detective, goes to prison undercover to befriend Hugh, a young man who was part of a gang that committed a robbery, in order to find out where they hid the money. Strong ...                See full summary »

name: Mother Knows Best
summary_text: A stage-actress mother and her daughter in a battle-of-wills in a "don't do this, daughter" and "don't do that, daughter" story of youthful folly and over-zealous parental devotion.

name: Modern Mothers
summary_text: Adele Dayton, a famous actress, visits her daughter, Mildred, whom she left with relatives as an infant. Her guardians, Mazie and John, permit the visit provided Adele conceals her ...                See full summary »

name: Los misterios de la imperial Toledo
Minuit... place Pigalle
summary_text: A Paris night club proprietor falls from grace and is reduced, after going away for a while, to working there in a menial position.

name: The Midnight Ace
summary_text: A young black girl falls in love with a master criminal, believing him to be a good and decent man. The criminal and his gang's many robberies leave the city gripped in terror. After the ...                See full summary »

name: Melody of Love
summary_text: Songwriter Jack Clark, who is in love with chorus girl Flo Thompson, enlists in the Army with his pal Lefty and is sent to France.

name: Maria Marten
summary_text: A squire kills his pregnant mistress to wed an heiress and is exposed by her mother's dream.

name: Mademoiselle Parley Voo
summary_text: A revue producer's wife is suspected of killing a detective for whom she vamped a jewel-stealing conjurer.

name: Madame Récamier
summary_text: Madame Récamier portrays the life of Juliette Récamier, a French society figure of the Napoleonic Era.

name: Love Over Night
summary_text: Rod La Roque is a subway ticket taker who believes beautiful Jeanette Loff is involved in a robbery but he still falls in love with her and tries to stop her wedding.

name: Lights of Paris
summary_text: A young French girl from a small town runs away to Paris to gain fame and fortune in the nightclub circuit. However, she soon finds out that "show business" isn't always a glamorous as she thought it would be.

name: Life's a Stage
summary_text: A busker confesses to shooting a seducer to save his amnesiac film-star daughter.

name: Life's Crossroads
summary_text: A man and woman survive a shipwreck and make it to an African shore. They must put their differences aside to survive. When a man from a nearby ranch finds them, they think they're safe...but are they?

name: Das letzte Fort
summary_text: Four adventurers fight against the French in Africa, the daughter of the French major tries to free him when he is captured and the enemy lieutenant falls for her for a while.

name: The Law of the Mounted
summary_text: Bob Custer is a Royal Canadian Mounted Policeman who is trailing and looking to put an end to a gang of fur thieves led by J. P. McGowan. The latter also turns out to be the killer that ...                See full summary »

name: The Latest from Paris
summary_text: Ann Dolan ( Norma Shearer ), a traveling saleswoman, falls in love with Joe Adams ( Ralph Forbes ), a rival salesman for another cloak and suit firm. Their engagement is brief, however, ...                See full summary »

name: Lady Be Good
summary_text: A silent film version of the Gershwin musical.

name: Just Married
summary_text: After many ridiculous moments, a young girl marries her former acquaintance, not with her fiancee.

name: Janssons frestelse

name: The Warning
summary_text: A mother prevents her daughter's elopement by telling how a wife shot her faithless husband.

name: How to Handle Women
summary_text: Leonard Higgins, a small-time commercial artist Prince Hendryx, and his country of Vulgaria from bankruptcy by exploiting the country's peanut crop, and wins the fair hand of Beatrice Fairbanks in the process.

name: The Hound of Silver Creek
summary_text: Molly White, the new schoolmistress at Silver Creek, makes the acquaintance of Jack Brooks, a wealthy eastern sportsman, when his pedigreed police dog, Dynamite, saves her from serious injury, and they become fast friends.

name: Hot News
summary_text: Hot News (1928) is a silent film comedy produced and distributed by Paramount Famous Lasky Corporation, an amalgamation of Famous Players-Lasky and Paramount Pictures. Clarence Badger directed and Bebe Daniels starred.

summary_text: Lila Garland ( Dorothy Gulliver ) marries Jim Clayton ( George Lewis ) against her parents' wishes. Disappointed that Lila did not marry wealth, Mrs. Garland tries to make her daughter ...                See full summary »

summary_text: The relationship between Austrian father and son composers: Johann Strauss I and Johann Strauss II.

summary_text: A painter (played by Dieterie) falls in love with the daughter (Deyers) of a neighboring count, causing the girl's stepmother to fly into a jealous rage.

name: Hattmakarens bal
summary_text: The hat maker Cederström wants his one daughter Marianne to marry the landlord Melander. However, Marianne is interested in the poet Ernst Malm.

name: Gypsy of the North
summary_text: Alice Culhane is a brassy Klondike dance-hall girl with a heart of gold is pursued by such ardent flirting swains as Steve Farrell and Chappie Evans. Alice plays her cards well.

name: O Grande Colégio Almeida Garrett no Bussaco
The Good-Bye Kiss
summary_text: Johnny (Johnny Burke), a World War One American doughboy whom everyone, including his sweetheart Sally (Sally Eilers), assume is a coward turns out to be a real hero.
